channel.title: Come to our City "Haven"
channel.description:
Hey,
If you play minecraft then you may be interested in visiting our city, called Haven. The owners are JameskMonger and Aaron_kw_yeung. The population is currently 5. This city is new but is growing at a rapid rate. We have already run out of room foor permanent houses but do not fret we have a 5 star hotel waiting for you. You can just rent a normal suite with a nice view and all your needs or you can splash out on the Luxury Suites which are super spacious and have lovely panoramic views of our growing city. All holiday makers are allowed to use the hotel pool and facilities. Prices are very reasonable!
If you plan to become a permanent resident of Haven we welcome you. As Haven is a growing city we would like your support and you can help us build the city into a thriving community. Although all people must be given permission to build by either aaron_kw_yeung or jameskmonger.
The server is: minecraft.moparisthebest.com We hope you visit soon! :D

@ranger_squad wrote:

I’m trying to talk him round, he took a joke the wrong way.

Read full topic

item.title: Come to our City "Haven"
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“ranger squad, post:4, topic:379725”]Go to http://www.moparisthebest.com/worldmap/

Zoom all the way in to the spawn island. Go south, you should see another island with two huge squares in it, and a dirt bridge linking it to spawn. That’s Haven.[/quote]

One square is empty can I make my home in a corner of that area

Read full topic

item.title: Come to our City "Haven"
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

Thankyou for making this Aaron, I’m sure it will attract lots of members into the city.

But one mistake, we haven’t run out of spaces for permanent houses, we still have the whole of the Metropolitan District to fill (which has an area of ~1700!)

Read full topic

item.title: Come to our City "Haven"
item.dc:creator: @aaron_kw_yeung aaron_kw_yeung
item.description:
@aaron_kw_yeung wrote:

Hey,

If you play minecraft then you may be interested in visiting our city, called Haven. The owners are JameskMonger and Aaron_kw_yeung. The population is currently 5. This city is new but is growing at a rapid rate. We have already run out of room foor permanent houses but do not fret we have a 5 star hotel waiting for you. You can just rent a normal suite with a nice view and all your needs or you can splash out on the Luxury Suites which are super spacious and have lovely panoramic views of our growing city. All holiday makers are allowed to use the hotel pool and facilities. Prices are very reasonable!

If you plan to become a permanent resident of Haven we welcome you. As Haven is a growing city we would like your support and you can help us build the city into a thriving community. Although all people must be given permission to build by either aaron_kw_yeung or jameskmonger.

The server is: minecraft.moparisthebest.com
We hope you visit soon!
